com.jayway.restassured.path.xml.config

Class XmlPathConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jayway.restassured.path.xml.config.XmlPathConfig

  • public class XmlPathConfig
extends Object
    Allows you to configure how XmlPath will handle object mapping (de-serialization).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XmlPathConfig()
      Creates a new XmlPathConfig that is configured to use the default JAXBObjectMapperFactory.
      XmlPathConfig(String defaultCharset)
      Create a new XmlPathConfig that uses the defaultCharset when deserializing XML data.
      XmlPathConfig(XmlPathConfig config)
      Create a new instance of a XmlPathConfig based on the properties in the supplied config.

      • feature

        public XmlPathConfig feature(String uri,
                    boolean enabled)
        Set a value of a feature flag.
        Parameters:
        uri - The feature name, which is a fully-qualified URI.
        enabled - The requested value of the feature (true or false).
        Returns:
        A new XmlPathConfig instance
        See Also:
        XMLReader.setFeature(java.lang.String, boolean)

      • disableLoadingOfExternalDtd

        public XmlPathConfig disableLoadingOfExternalDtd()
        Disables external DTD loading.

        This is a shortcut for doing:

         setFeature("http://apache.org/xml/features/nonvalidating/load-external-dtd", false);

        Returns:
        A new XmlPathConfig instance
        See Also:
        feature(String, boolean)

      • charset

        public String charset()
        Returns:
        The charset to assume when parsing XML data

      • charset

        public XmlPathConfig charset(String charset)
        Returns:
        A new XmlPathConfig instance with that assumes the supplied charset when parsing XML documents.

      • defaultParserType

        public XmlPathConfig defaultParserType(XmlParserType defaultParserType)
        Creates an xml path configuration that uses the specified parser type as default.
        Parameters:
        defaultParserType - The default parser type to use. If null then classpath scanning will be used.

      • defaultObjectDeserializer

        public XmlPathConfig defaultObjectDeserializer(XmlPathObjectDeserializer defaultObjectDeserializer)
        Creates an json path configuration that uses the specified object de-serializer as default.
        Parameters:
        defaultObjectDeserializer - The object de-serializer to use. If null then classpath scanning will be used.

      • declareNamespaces

        public XmlPathConfig declareNamespaces(Map<String,String> namespacesToDeclare)
        Specify declared namespaces that will be used when parsing XML.
        Parameters:
        namespacesToDeclare - A map containing features that will be used by the underlying XmlSlurper.
        Returns:
        A new instance of XmlPathConfig
        See Also:
        XMLReader.setFeature(java.lang.String, boolean)

      • declaredNamespace

        public XmlPathConfig declaredNamespace(String prefix,
                              String namespaceURI)
        Declares a namespace.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The feature name, which is a fully-qualified URI.
        namespaceURI - The requested value of the feature (true or false).
        Returns:

        For syntactic sugar.

      • xmlPathConfig

        public static XmlPathConfig xmlPathConfig()
        Returns:
        A static way to create a new XmlPathConfig instance without calling "new" explicitly. Mainly for syntactic sugar.
